DOC.detailed_description: Subject recruitment Patients admit Prince Wales Hospital AECOPD recruit study . Subjects pneumonic change chest radiograph exclude . Age sex-matched COPD subject stable state ( without AECOPD least 10 week ) healthy , non-smoking subject recruit control . Collection exhale breath condensate ( EBC ) EBC collect use EcoScreen ( VIASYS Healthcare , Conshohochen , PA , USA ) accord manufacturer 's instruction . EBC store 250 microL aliquot immediately -70oC analysis . EBC collect Day 5 , 14 , 30 60 hospitalization subject AECOPD . For stable COPD patient normal control , EBC collection perform . Measurement TNF alpha , LTB4 IL-8 The concentration TNF alpha , LTB4 , IL-8 EBC measure one batch high-sensitivity sandwich enzyme immunoassay ( TNF alpha IL-8 BioSource International , Camarillo , CA , USA ; LTB4 Cayman Chemical Company , Ann Arbor , MI , USA ) accord manufacturer ' instruction . Intra-subject repeatability TNF alpha , LTB4 IL-8 assess collection EBC stable COPD subject . EBC collect described time ( 09:00 10:00 ) 2 consecutive day .
